text: Gladstone Gander is the luck cousin of Donald and Fethry Duck,is the son of Daphne Duck and Goostave Gander. The Luck was inherited from the mother. Gladstone is one of the first works by Barks, even before Uncle Scrooge. GLaDstone boasts of great fortune that, look not inherited from the mother, and often in the stories of Italian production comes out with his cousin Donald Duck to annoy,for example the DoubleDuck saga. As countless other characters from Carl Barks appears in television saga DuckTales, here the lucky duck acts as secondary character. Category:Disney characters
title: Gladstone Gander
